description: Gets information about a specified framework.

nested_items.name: framework
nested_items.description: The framework that the GetAssessmentFramework API returned.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the framework.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the framework.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the framework.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the framework is a standard framework or a custom framework.

nested_items.name: complianceType
nested_items.description: The compliance type that the framework supports, such as CIS or HIPAA.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the framework.

nested_items.name: logo
nested_items.description: The logo that's associated with the framework.

nested_items.name: controlSources
nested_items.description: The control data sources where Audit Manager collects evidence from.

nested_items.name: controlSets
nested_items.description: The control sets that are associated with the framework.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the control set name in a plain string format.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the control set.

nested_items.name: controls
nested_items.description: The list of controls within the control set.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the control.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the control is a standard control or a custom control.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the control.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the control.

nested_items.name: testingInformation
nested_items.description: The steps that you should follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.

nested_items.name: actionPlanTitle
nested_items.description: The title of the action plan for remediating the control.

nested_items.name: actionPlanInstructions
nested_items.description: The recommended actions to carry out if the control isn't fulfilled.

nested_items.name: controlSources
nested_items.description: The data source types that determine where Audit Manager collects evidence from for the control.

nested_items.name: controlMappingSources
nested_items.description: The data mapping sources for the control.

nested_items.name: sourceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the source.

nested_items.name: sourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the source.

nested_items.name: sourceDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the source.

nested_items.name: sourceSetUpOption
nested_items.description: The setup option for the data source. This option reflects if the evidence collection method is automated or manual. If you don't provide a value for sourceSetUpOption, Audit Manager automatically infers and populates the correct value based on the sourceType that you specify.

nested_items.name: sourceType
nested_items.description: Specifies which type of data source is used to collect evidence.
The source can be an individual data source type, such as AWS_Cloudtrail, AWS_Config, AWS_Security_Hub, AWS_API_Call, or MANUAL.
The source can also be a managed grouping of data sources, such as a Core_Control or a Common_Control.

nested_items.name: sourceKeyword
nested_items.description: A keyword that relates to the control data source.
Config rules supported by Audit Manager.
Security Hub controls supported by Audit Manager.
API calls supported by Audit Manager.
CloudTrail event names supported by Audit Manager.

nested_items.name: sourceFrequency
nested_items.description: Specifies how often evidence is collected from the control mapping source.

nested_items.name: troubleshootingText
nested_items.description: The instructions for troubleshooting the control.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the control was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the control was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or role that created the control.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The user or role that most recently updated the control.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the control. The END_OF_SUPPORT state is applicable to standard controls only. This state indicates that the standard control can still be used to collect evidence, but Audit Manager is no longer updating or maintaining that control.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the framework was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the framework was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or role that created the framework.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The user or role that most recently updated the framework.
(string) ---
(string) ---
